name: site
description: A framework for running multiple dev trackers

scripts.dev:components: npm run lint:components && cross-env NODE_ENV=development browserify app/index.jsx -o web/scripts/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] && node scripts/copy-app.js
scripts.build:ads: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify app/ads.jsx -o web/scripts/ads.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] && uglifyjs web/scripts/ads.js -o web/scripts/ads.js -c warnings=false -m
scripts.build:app: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify app/index.jsx -o web/scripts/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] && uglifyjs web/scripts/app.js -o web/scripts/app.js -c warnings=false -m
scripts.build: npm run build:ads && npm run build:app && node scripts/build.js
